page.title: 20Port of Sunderland 2.
page.content:
{SOUTH DOCK The South Docks handle bulk and mixed general cargoes,the shipment of coal and coke and the discharge and loading of petrol.The docks have a container park,oil installations and ship repairing yards.
{CORPORATION QUAY This is a deep water quay.It is equipped for the rapid handling of mixed general cargo.The oil storage installation is connected to the quay by pipeline.400,000 tonnes of petroleum come through the port each year.In 1983,a 35 tonne crane for container and general cargo handling was made available. Visiting naval vessels tie up at the quay when they call on a courtesy visit.
